title: ELEGANT, SPACIOUS STUDIO
posting_body: ['ELEGANT, SPACIOUS, TWO ROOM STUDIO IN SERENE, VERDANT NEIGHBORHOOD OF COLORFUL VICTORIAN HOMES.', ' This unit comes beautifully furnished.', 'HEAT, WATER & ELECTRICITY INCLUDED.', ' ONE OCCUPANT ONLY.', "Ten foot ceilings, giant windows looking toward sunset and Peter's Hill a mile away.", 'Stylish, colorful new tile bath with double shower.', ' Abundant storage in bathroom cabinetry and shelves.', 'Hotel-style efficiency kitchen, with cooktop, refrigerator, sink, microwave, but no oven.', ' A convection unit is fine', 'A deep porch, framed by pairs of doric columns, wraps around most of the house; the west-side porch is a stupendous spot from which to enjoy the sunsets.', 'Beautiful two level yard with gardens and patios; a serpentine, flat-stone wall; thirteen fruit bearing trees and shrubs (quince, blueberry, black berry, goose berry, raspberry); three varieties of grapes growing on a tall pergola; a koi pond with waterfalls and colorful comets and koi darting up to the surface.', 'All this is only a few minutes from downtown Boston by T or bike along bike path, both only two blocks from us.', 'We are located one block from the 39 Bus to the medical area (about a ten minute ride) and about a six minue walk to the Green Steet subway stop on the Orange Line.', 'We are also a ten minute walk to the Arboretum and Jamaica Pond, and a couple of minutes to banks, a pharmacy, post office, copy center, Whole Foods, Happy Market, great restaurants for take-out, and other shopping.', 'Off street parking may be negotiable.', 'On street parking is free and unrestricted on our street.', 'One very small, hypo-allergenic, quiet dog considered.', 'We prefer 12-month leases.', 'We have based the rent on that length of stay.', ' A six month stay is the shortest we would consider and the monthly rent will be higher.']
